job_description: Software Engineering Co-ops needed for May 2015We want you because of what you have to offer. Our co-ops over their terms are given the same technical challenges as our staff developers. We are a merit-based organization. You will learn the skills to develop large scale software products. Many of our co-ops return as full-time employees.Simba Technologies Inc. has market leading technologies (http://www.simba.com/) that are used by the industry's top database and business intelligence vendors. We develop high-performing and high-volume data access solutions to make it easy for other developers to create their products.Simba Technologies Inc. is the recognized world leader in building full-stack data access products and solutions. Simba works with major companies like Microsoft, Oracle, SAP and Teradata to deliver the best-in-class relational and multi-dimensional data connectivity solutions. Literally, millions of people use our software every day.What skills you will learn:• Object-oriented design and programming• Ability to read, use and apply design patterns• Critically provide review of requirements, design, code and testing• Actively participating in development meetings• Being a professional software developer
job_requirements: What you need to have:• Enthusiasm to actively contribute in a small team environment• Experience in an object-oriented programming languages - C++/Java/C#• Good command of English with excellent written and verbal communication skills• Creativity with excellent problem solving skills• Adaptability to a wide range of technical areas• Experience with UMLOpen To All Majors:No
